channel.title: RuneStorm | My First RSPS | Custom Home | Much MORE!
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://runestorm.net/logo.png[/img]
[size=10pt][b]Home: http://runestorm.net Forums: http://runestorm.net/forum Play At: http://runestorm.net/play/play.php[/b][/size]
[b]Features:[/b]
- 2 Quests ( More Coming ) - Vote System - Fast Switch - 100% Skilling - Dungeoneering - Hunter - Summoning - Custom Items - Custom NPC'S - Curses - Daily Updates - VPS HOSTED 2 GB RAM - No Lag - Community - MYSQL Connected - Lottery - Dicing - PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc - Ingame Highscores - Loyalty title system - Weapon combination selection in duel arena - Cross-world player list support [b]- MUCH MUCH MORE ![/b]
Media:
[b]Quests![/b] [img]http://runestorm.net/pics/upload.png[/img]
